title: Calories in a Cheese Stick
meta_description: Discover calories in a cheese stick, including protein, fat, carbs, full nutrition breakdown per serving, and easy tweaks for variations.
assumptions: Standard 1 oz (28 g) mozzarella string cheese stick, pasteurized, low-moisture part-skim milk.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by brand, cheese type, size, and processing; check labels for exact values.

quick_answer.text: A typical cheese stick provides ~80 kcal and ~7 g protein.

label_note: Values mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison with packaging.

faqs.q: How many calories in a cheese stick?
faqs.a: About 80 kcal for a standard 1 oz mozzarella cheese stick.

faqs.q: What's the protein in a cheese stick?
Are cheese sticks high in sodium?
faqs.a: Yes, around 200 mg sodium per stick due to processing.
Very low, about 1 g carbs and 0 g fiber per stick.

faqs.q: How does brand affect calories in a cheese stick?
faqs.a: Brands vary; low-fat options are lower (50-70 kcal), full-fat higher (90+ kcal).
